flawed_nl_solution:
If Evan had 200 books two years ago, he currently has 200-40 = <<200-40=160>>160 books.
In five years, Evan will have 60 more than 160*5 = 8000 books which is the number he has now.
This means Evan will have 8000+60 = <<8000+60=8060>>8060 books in five years.
#### 8060

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 800, not 8000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
